#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define LL unsigned long long
const int MOD = 1e9+7;

LL power(LL a, LL b, LL c) {
	LL ret=1; 
	while(b) {
		if(b&1) {
			ret = (ret*a)%c;
		}
		a = (a*a)%c;
		b >>= 1;
	}
	return ret;
}


LL ans(LL n)
{
	LL x = (n*(n-1))%MOD*(n-2)%MOD*(n-3)%MOD;
	x=(x*power(24,MOD-2,MOD))%MOD;
	LL y = (n*(n-1))/2;
	y%=MOD;
	return (x+y+1)%MOD;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		LL n;
		cin>>n;
		cout<<ans(n)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
